m_szDocTitle: BYD boosts profit estimate as Chinese automakers resilient in slowdown | Reuters
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Fri Jan 8, 2016 12:11am EST BYD boosts profit estimate as Chinese automakers resilient in slowdown A customer checks a BYD e6 electric car at a dealership in Beijing, China, December 9, 2015. Reuters/Jason Lee BEIJING/SHANGHAI BYD Co, a Chinese automaker backed by Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway, raised its 2015 profit estimate to a five-year high, citing strong demand for its electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles. Despite a slowing economy and volatile financial markets, Chinese automakers such as BYD and Geely Automobile Holdings have flagged bumper profit
